data.text: @WalesOnline He has controlled by fear for the last 2 years. He has not trusted people to be sensible, he has not let people make their own decisions on how they should live their lives, he has ruined children's education, he has not been challenged by the media. We need a Wales only enquiry.

@WalesOnline There is no doubt that @MarkDrakeford is one of the World’s best leaders for his tireless work & effort he put into the Covid-19 pandemic, the man is a leg end and doesn’t get the recognition he deserves from us.
One day soon he will end up serving time for his crimes against us.
